 1996-16721996-10-290JUS,  TC,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisExtension of the leave of absence of the Hon. GUY A. RICHARD to allow him to complete his review of the factors related to the sale of CN Route and the subsequent bankruptcy of Transport Route Canada Inc., including the impact on the company's employees, and to submit his findings to the Minister of Transport no later than October 31, 1996.
Attachments
